description: Template for research and analysis projects with literature review workflows, hypothesis tracking, experiment design patterns, and data analysis standards

included_components.name: task-management
included_components.description: Hierarchical task tracking with automatic parent completion, difficulty-based breakdown requirements, and status validation

files.name: literature-review.md
files.description: Structured workflow for conducting literature reviews including search strategies, source evaluation, and synthesis patterns

files.name: data-analysis.md
files.description: Step-by-step data analysis workflow covering exploratory analysis, statistical testing, visualization, and interpretation

files.name: citation-management.md
files.description: Standards for managing citations including citation styles, reference organization, and bibliography maintenance

files.name: hypothesis-tracking.md
files.description: Patterns for tracking hypotheses with formulation, testing criteria, evidence collection, and validation status

files.name: experiment-design.md
files.description: Templates and patterns for designing experiments including variable identification, control groups, and methodology documentation

research.literature: Literature review notes and summaries (created as needed)
research.hypotheses: Hypothesis documentation and tracking (created as needed)
research.experiments: Experiment designs and protocols (created as needed)

data.processed: Processed and cleaned data (created as needed)
data.analysis: Analysis results and outputs (created as needed)

research.findings: Research findings and conclusions (created as needed)

initialization_questions.question: What type of research will this project focus on?
initialization_questions.impact: Determines which workflows and patterns to emphasize

initialization_questions.question: What is the primary domain or field?
initialization_questions.impact: Influences citation style, methodology standards, and terminology

initialization_questions.question: What data analysis tools will you use?
initialization_questions.impact: Affects data analysis workflow and file organization

initialization_questions.question: What citation style do you need?
Will this be collaborative research?
initialization_questions.impact: Determines emphasis on collaboration standards and review processes

initialization_questions.question: Do you need IRB/ethics review tracking?
initialization_questions.impact: Adds ethics documentation and compliance tracking if needed

initialization_questions.question: What is the project timeline?
initialization_questions.impact: Affects task planning granularity and milestone tracking

recommended_tools: Data analysis software (Python, R, SPSS, etc.)

gemini_api_use_cases: Search and summarize recent research literature (with grounding)
Review experimental designs for methodology gaps
Analyze data patterns and suggest statistical approaches
Provide domain expertise for hypothesis formulation
Review research findings for logical consistency
Suggest relevant prior work and citations
claude_use_cases: Write and refactor analysis code (Python, R, SQL)
Structure and organize research data files
Manage task breakdown for complex research projects
